title: Organize Now | Add, edit, and delete to-dos
description: A simple to-do app built with Next.js and TypeScript.

step1.title: Manage your tasks
step1.description: You can easily manage all your daily tasks for free

step2.title: Create daily routine
step2.description: You can create your personalized routine to stay productive

step3.title: Organize your tasks
step3.description: You can organize your daily tasks by adding your tasks into separate categories

tasks.whatDoYouWantToDo: What do you want to do today?

focus.title: Organize Now | Focus in your tasks
focus.description: Focus in your tasks with Organize Now using the Pomodoro Technique. Increase your productivity and quality of work. Get more done in less time.

addTask.title: Organize Now | Add a new task
addTask.description: Add a new task to your to-do list
addTask.heading: Add a new task

delete.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

editTask.title: Organize Now | Edit a task
editTask.description: Edit a task from your to-do list
editTask.heading: Edit a task

about.title: Organize Now | About Us
about.heading: About Us
about.lead: Welcome to Organize Now, where simplicity meets productivity. Organize Now is not just an app; it is a reflection of our dedication to creating digital solutions that simplify your daily tasks.
developerDescription: As a web developer, I have always been fascinated by the potential of technology to transform our lives. My journey began with a passion for coding and a desire to create digital solutions that simplify everyday tasks.

Driven by a passion for coding and a commitment to user-centered design, I embarked on the journey to create Organize Now. From conceptualization to execution, every line of code represents my dedication to improving your organizational experience.
missionDescription: At Organize Now, our mission is to empower you to take control of your daily tasks. We believe that simplicity is the key to productivity, and our app is designed to simplify your organizational experience.

Our commitment to user-centered design and seamless functionality is reflected in every feature of Organize Now. Whether you are managing your daily tasks or creating a personalized routine, our app is designed to enhance your productivity.
visionDescription: Our vision is to create a digital solution that simplifies your daily tasks and enhances your productivity. We believe that technology has the power to transform your organizational experience, and our app is designed to reflect this vision.
From the simplicity of our user interface to the functionality of our features, every aspect of Organize Now is designed to provide you with the best experience in your daily life.
about.end: Thank you for choosing Organize Now. We are committed to improving your organizational experience and helping you with your tasks. If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to get in touch. We are here to help you make the most of Organize Now.
